import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import NoData from '../components/Templates/NoData' import Page from '../components/Templates/Page' import { fetchGateways, fetchGrouped, fetchProjects, fetchReport } from '../utils/api' export default function Home() { const [displayNoData, setDisplayNoData] = useState(true) const [displayProjects, setDisplayProjects] = useState('d-none') const [displayGateways, setDisplayGateways] = useState('d-none') const [projectsList, setProjectsList] = useState([]) const [projectName, setProjectName] = useState('Select project') const [gatewayName, setGatewayName] = useState('Select gateway') const [projectsBnt, setProjectsButton] = useState(null) const [gatewaysBtn, setGatewaysBtn] = useState(null) const [projectsAccordion, setProjectsAccordion] = useState([]) const getAll = async (data) => { let response = await fetchGrouped(data) setProjectsButton(response.projects.map((project) =>
    • )) setGatewaysBtn(response.gateways.map((gateway) =>
    • )) setProjectsList(response.projects) } useEffect(()=> { getAll({from:'2020-01-01', to:'2022-06-06'}) }, []) const displayProject = () => { setProjectsAccordion([]) projectsList.forEach(project => { setProjectsAccordion(projectsAccordion => [...projectsAccordion,

    { project.transactions.map((transaction) => )}
    Date Gateaway Transaction ID Amount
    {transaction.created} {transaction.gatewayId} {transaction.paymentId} {transaction.amount}
    ]) }); setProjectName('All projects') setGatewayName('All gateways') setDisplayNoData(false) setDisplayProjects('d-block') } return ( <>

    Reports

    Easily generate a report of your transactions
    {/* Projects Dropdown */}
      • { projectsBnt }
    {/* Gateways Dropdown */}
      • { gatewaysBtn }
    { projectName } | { gatewayName }
    { projectsAccordion }
    { projectName } | { gatewayName }
    ) }
